Package mendel.comm

Contains communication structures to abstract away the networking implementation in the mendel.network package.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MendelEventMap  
    QueryEvent
    Defines a (Exact) query between StorageNodes.
    QueryRequest
    Defines an event to signal to forward the query to the correct StorageNodes for processing
    QueryResponse  
    StorageEvent
    Represents an internal storage event at a StorageNode.
    StorageRequest
    Represents a client request for storage at a Mendel StorageNode.

Package mendel.comm Description

Contains communication structures to abstract away the networking implementation in the mendel.network package.
